Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Notion CRM Connector

A Next.js web application that creates and manages personal CRM databases
in Notion workspaces with Accounts, Contacts, and Opportunities databases.

Features:
- Secure OAuth authentication with Notion
- Customizable schema editor with real-time progress updates
- Smart bidirectional relations between databases
- Modern UI with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
